metadata.name: Beyond Lovecraft
metadata.description: What happens when anti-capitalist campaigners stage a protest in the ancient Antarctic city of the Elder Things? What cosmic terrors will they uncover, and is there an evil worse than Wall St? Beyond Lovecraft - Occupy the Mountains of Madness, is the first in a series of four stories that bring the Cthulhu Mythos into the present day to confront contemporary issues, while at the same time remaining completely true to the vision of the macabre master of horror fiction - H. P. Lovecraft.
